quotes.message: A day of travelling will bring a basketful of learning.
quotes.name: Vietnamese

quotes.message: Brains are better than brawn.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Everyone is ignorant only on different subjects.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Instead of seeking new landscapes, develop new eyes.
quotes.name: Marcel Proust

quotes.message: Knowledge is more than equivalent to force.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Learning is better than house and land.
quotes.name: David Garrick

quotes.message: People learn more on their own rather than being force fed.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Presumption first blinds a man, then sets him a running.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The shoe knows if the stocking has a hole.
quotes.name: Bahamian

quotes.message: What signifies knowing the names, if you know not the natures of things.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: When the pupil is ready, the teacher will come.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Wit is the only wall between us and the dark.
quotes.name: Mark Van Doren

quotes.message: With time even a bear can learn to dance.
quotes.name: Yiddish

quotes.message: Distance lends enchantment to the view.
quotes.name: Thomas Campbell

quotes.message: Doubt is the key to knowledge.
quotes.name: Iranian

quotes.message: Example is the best precept.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: It is better to be born a beggar than a fool.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: It is better to be the head of a chicken than the rear of an ox.
quotes.name: Japanese

quotes.message: Knowledge is power.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Mistakes are doorways to discovery.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Put two and two together.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: What good is running when you're on the wrong road.
quotes.name: German

quotes.message: When you're sad, learn something,
quotes.name: Merlin
